constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: Tom 每个时刻只能携带最多一颗糖果（容量约束）

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: Tom 只能在 Wilco 到达之前购买糖果（操作时机限制）
constraints.formal: Tom's action must occur before Wilco's arrival at each location

constraints.name: state_transition
constraints.description: Tom 拿到糖果后必须将其带走直到交给小孩（状态转移约束）
constraints.formal: if Tom picks up a candy, it must be delivered to a child before picking up another

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: Wilco 从第一个地点走到最后一个，顺序访问所有地点（有序性约束）
constraints.formal: Wilco visits locations in the order from 1 to N

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 商店街上的地点要么是商店要么是空地（子集约束）
constraints.formal: locations are either shops or empty spaces
